aim4.voronoi

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • aim4.voronoi.Vertex
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Site

    public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
    A vertex in a Delaunay triangulation.
    Author:
    Steven Benoit

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double EPSILON
      distance within which we consider a vertex to fall on an edge
      boolean isBogus

      the X coordinate

      Tests whether the points of a triangle are in counterclockwise order.

      Returns the square of the distance of this vertex from the origin.

      Generates the string representation of the vertex.
      static double triArea(Vertex pt1, Vertex pt2, Vertex pt3)
      Computes twice the area of the oriented triangle (pt1, pt2, pt3) (the area is positive if the triangle is oriented counterclockwise).

                          Vertex pt2,

        Tests whether this point lies within the circle circumscribing a triangle.
        Parameters:
        pt1 - the first point defining the triangle
        pt2 - the second point defining the triangle
        pt3 - the third point defining the triangle
        Returns:
        true if this point is inside the circumscribing circle; false if not

        public static double triArea(Vertex pt1,
                             Vertex pt2,
                             Vertex pt3)
        Computes twice the area of the oriented triangle (pt1, pt2, pt3) (the area is positive if the triangle is oriented counterclockwise).
        Parameters:
        pt1 - the first point
        pt2 - the second point
        pt3 - the third point
        Returns:
        twice the oriented area

        pt2 - the second point
        pt3 - the third point
        Returns:
